$description: Warm, refined, compact. A design-studio aesthetic where data glows like embers. Terracotta warmth meets jade accents in a dense, information-rich layout built for designers who appreciate both beauty and substance. Space Grotesk brings geometric character; tight spacing maximizes data density.

sans.$description: Geometric, modern typeface with character - designed for interfaces where personality matters

mono.$description: Matching monospace with geometric DNA for code, data tables, and metrics

sm.$description: Small (13px) - table rows, secondary content, compact data

base.$description: Base (14px) - body text optimized for data-dense layouts
